description: Update an existing contact. Accepts uuid (ID!, required) and UpdateContactInput with first_name, last_name, company_uuid, email, title, departments, mobile_phone, email_status, seniority, status, text_search (all optional). Uses ConnectraClient to update contact in Connectra service. Returns Contact with updated fields. Requires authentication. Raises NotFoundError (404) if contact not found. Activity logged (non-blocking).
graphql_operation: mutation UpdateContact($uuid: ID!, $input: UpdateContactInput!) { contacts { updateContact(uuid: $uuid, input: $input) { id firstName lastName email jobTitle company { id name } } } }
